```{r setup, include=FALSE}
source("TidyQuantPlot.R")
StockData <- eventReactive(input$update,{getStockData(input$ticker,fromDate = input$dateRange[1],toDate = input$dateRange[2])})
```

Input {.sidebar}
-------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
textInput("ticker","Ticker","AMZN")
dateRangeInput("dateRange","Date Range",start = today()-90)
actionButton("update","Update")
```

Column 
--------------------------------------------------------

### Chart

```{r}
renderPlotly({
  StockData() %>% plotStockData()
})
```
